title: all
text: There is no widely recognized logical function named all. A function that was applied the same way to all data elements would not be demonstrating logic

title: if
text: The if is a valid logical function that runs if a certain condition is true and satisfied.

title: sum
text: Incorrect: The act of summing or adding values does not contain any test of whether a conditional statement is true or false, so it is not considered a logical function.
